ygData.subject: RE: Observations: Upper & Lower Guk
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Unless it was changed it yesterday s patch, Guardian gives the same MR as Elemental and Purifying.  I ve been tracking this ever since I got Guardian.  It
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 28 Oct 1999, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> what i thought as well. seems like guardian would be a completely useless
> song if elemental did the same MR as well as FR and CR! i am pretty sure
> guardian does more MR than elemental, but won't know til i get home.

Unless it was changed it yesterday's patch, Guardian gives the
same MR as Elemental and Purifying. I've been tracking this
ever since I got Guardian. It seemed odd to me too, but
Guardian has the advantage of stacking with certain other
songs (mainly Elemental and Purifying and so far all of the
Psalm series) and giving a bigger AC boost. A couple levels
ago, I'd go from 45 to 90 MR playing Elemental, and from 90 to
135 MR playing Guardian on top of that.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
